name: POP TRAP
description: Restore a value in a trap or group of traps that was saved previously using the PUSHT (Push Trap) command.

parameters.name: trap_list
parameters.description: trap1,trap2,...,trapx - Required - The list of traps to restore.

comments: When you use the PUSHT command the current trap settings are saved on an internal stack. This stack, just like all others used in microcomputers, is a Last In- First Out process. That means that the last value
